abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile focuses on
            strengthening Turkey’s public sector administration and
            regulatory environment. Sustained progress was threatened by
            ballooning health and social security costs, an investment
            climate clouded by outmoded codes and regulations, and
            persistent unemployment. Equitable Growth and Employment
            loan series was introduced by the Bank to support continued
            public sector and regulatory reforms in pursuit of equitable
            growth and employment.
